HeroSection.name: Dennis Vaga
HeroSection.description: I’m a Full Stack developer focused on React and Next.js, with experience building responsive UIs and custom WordPress websites. Skilled in modern web technologies and creating end-to-end solutions that deliver strong user experiences.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.paragraph1: I’m a Full Stack developer with 4+ years of experience building responsive, high-performing websites and applications.
AboutMe.paragraph2: I work primarily with modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Next.js to create fast, SEO-friendly, and interactive web applications. I also have experience developing custom WordPress websites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
AboutMe.paragraph3: My work spans both frontend and backend development — from building clean user interfaces to implementing server-side logic and integrations.
AboutMe.paragraph4: I aim to build digital experiences that are not only functional but also thoughtfully designed, helping businesses move faster and smarter.

MySkills.title: Skills
MySkills.description: These are the technologies I specialize in for building modern web applications.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on recently.

bodyfuelShop.title: BodyFuel Shop
bodyfuelShop.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform for fitness supplements built with Next.js, Express, and Prisma. Features AI-powered product discovery, secure authentication, and seamless shopping experience with advanced product variants support.

bodyfuelAdmin.title: BodyFuel Admin
bodyfuelAdmin.description: Comprehensive administrative dashboard for managing the BodyFuel e-commerce platform, featuring advanced data tables, inventory control, order processing, and product management capabilities.

bodyfuelBackend.title: BodyFuel API
bodyfuelBackend.description: Robust Express.js backend API powering the BodyFuel ecosystem with feature-based architecture, AI integrations, and comprehensive data management for the e-commerce platform.

quickShop.title: Quick Shop
quickShop.description: A mobile e-commerce app built with React Native and Expo that connects to a headless WordPress/WooCommerce backend. Features complete product catalog, shopping cart functionality, and real-time data synchronization via REST API integration.

ProjectDetail.applicationsDescription: This project consists of multiple applications working together to create a complete solution.

bodyfuel.title: BodyFuel
bodyfuel.subtitle: Full-Stack E-commerce Platform for Fitness Supplements
bodyfuel.description: A comprehensive monorepo e-commerce solution built with Next.js, Express, and Prisma, featuring AI-powered product discovery, real-time inventory management, and separate customer and administrative interfaces.
bodyfuel.longDescription: BodyFuel represents a complete fitness supplements e-commerce ecosystem built using modern web technologies. This project showcases advanced full-stack development skills including monorepo architecture, AI integration, real-time features, and comprehensive authentication systems.
features: AI-Powered Product Chat with streaming responses
Comprehensive admin dashboard with business insights
Secure authentication with OAuth and email/password
Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Automated image storage with AWS S3
Advanced product filtering and search capabilities

shop.name: BodyFuel Shop
shop.description: Customer-facing storefront with AI-powered product discovery, shopping cart, and secure checkout process. Features responsive design and real-time inventory updates.

admin.name: BodyFuel Admin
admin.description: Comprehensive administrative dashboard for product management, order processing, inventory control, and business analytics with real-time insights.

backend.name: API Backend
backend.description: Express-based REST API powering both frontend applications with feature-based architecture, authentication middleware, and AI integration endpoints.

quickShop.title: Quick Shop
quickShop.subtitle: React Native E-commerce App
quickShop.description: A mobile-first e-commerce app built with React Native and Expo, featuring clean architecture, headless WordPress integration, and modern development practices for seamless cross-platform shopping experience.
features: Cross-platform mobile experience across iOS and Android with single codebase
Advanced product catalog with infinite scroll and hierarchical navigation
Modern architecture with TypeScript, Expo Router, and clean code patterns
Headless WordPress + WooCommerce integration for dynamic content management
Performance-optimized state management with offline support and caching
Built-in development tools with network diagnostics and debug screens
